entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and early afternoon. Snow level rising to 1100 metres near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
